name: node-server-testing-guided
description: Starter Code for Node Server Testing Module

scripts.//: note the use of cross-env ... it's a module that simply
allows us to add environment variables in a cross-platform
manner... the syntax and idiosynchrosies of setting environment
variables on Windows, Mac, in bash, and other environments are
all handled with this module, and we can set environment
variables that impact our testing suites (like setting the
correct DB environment for our jest sweets.)
